tool.name: qiime2 gneiss dendrogram-heatmap

param.name: table
param.label: table: FeatureTable[Frequency]
param.help: [required] The feature table that will be plotted as a heatmap. This table is assumed to have strictly positive values.

param.name: tree
param.label: tree: Hierarchy
param.help: [required] A hierarchy of feature identifiers where each tipcorresponds to the feature identifiers in the table. This tree can contain tip ids that are not present in the table, but all feature ids in the table must be present in this tree.

param.name: type
param.label: metadata: MetadataColumn[Categorical]
param.help: [required] Categorical metadata column to group the samples.

validator.message: The first column cannot be selected (they are IDs).

param.name: pseudocount
param.label: pseudocount: Float
param.help: [default: 0.5] The pseudocount to add to avoid division by zero.

param.name: method
param.label: method: Str % Choices('clr', 'log')
param.help: [default: 'clr'] Specifies how the data should be normalized for display.Options include 'log' or 'clr' (default='clr').

param.name: color_map
param.help: [default: 'viridis'] Specifies the color map for plotting the heatmap. See https://matplotlib.org/examples/color/colormaps_reference.html for more details.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: gneiss dendrogram-heatmap ================================== Dendrogram heatmap.
Outputs: -------- :visualization.qzv: <no description>
|
Description: ------------ Visualize the feature table as a heatmap, with samples sorted along a specified categorical metadata column and features clustered together specified by the tree.
|
